name: Invokation Coupons
desc: You can obtain these coupons after participating in various events at the King of Invokations Grand Prix. During the event, you can exchange them for rewards.

value.text:
Version 3.7 Event - Duel! The Summoners' Summit!
Duel! The Summoners' Summit!: Round I-IV
Activity - A Tour of Wonders
Activity - Zero Hour Invokation
Activity - Heart of the Dice

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

customize.name: Invokation Coupons
customize.desc: You can obtain these coupons after participating in various events at the King of Invokations Grand Prix. During the event, you can exchange them for rewards.

customize.name: Congealed Pupa Wax
customize.desc:
Specialized refinement material for Ibis Piercer.
In the Great Red Sand, the youth who later became the King of Invokations was requested by the descendants of the Ibis King to spend a few days formulating bowstring wax from Sand Grease Pupae. However, the legendary bow disappeared along with the Ibis King, and only the recipe for making pupa wax was passed down from generation to generation. Perhaps it's still waiting for the day when it can be used again.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.
